summary: A Lebanese photographer living in Brazil in the '30s manages to take pictures of Lampião, a legendary Brazilian outlaw, kind of a tropical Robin Hood.
cast: Duda Mamberti|Luiz Carlos Vasconcelos|Aramis Trindade|Chico Díaz|Joffre Soares|Cláudio Mamberti|Germano Haiut|Manoel Constantino|Giovanna Gold|Johnny Hooker|Daniela Mastroianni|Rutílio Oliveira|Roger de Renor|Geninha da Rosa Borges
title: Baile Perfumado
